question: 私大
sourceMnemonic: You know how <ja>私</ja> can mean <kanji>private</kanji> and how <ja>大</ja> is the first half of <ja>大学</ja>? Well, combine those together and you have the shortened version of <vocabulary>private college</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>private university</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>大</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

You went to a specific <vocabulary>private college</vocabulary> just to study <reading>dye</reading>s (<ja>だい</ja>). You're so into dyes that you decided to go to this extremely expensive <vocabulary>private university</vocabulary> that specializes in dyes. Good for you!
